name: Miniature Spacemen
description: the main gameplay is simple the whole goal is to get the pieces of the ship rebuild it and get off the planet, these are everyday spaceman things. This is hindered by the fact that he has Multiple Sclerosis and the player has the must have a TENS device to simulate MS and the struggles that it can take on someone's everyday life. There are medicine packs spread throughout the levels that can help lower the intensity of the TENS device so you will be able to make it through the levels easier.
